meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Adrienne Bell Steve Baker Debbie Sherry Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #525.

td.p: Adrienne Bell, a teacher from San Diego, California
Steve Baker, a professor of international politics from Pacific Grove, California
Debbie Sherry, a nurse from Yuba City, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $9,600)

tr.td: ANCIENT RUMORS
SPORTS
U.S.A.
FILM GEOGRAPHY
FEMALE SINGERS
NUMBER PLEASE

toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Debbie: What is Before Christ?)
---
(Alex: Who is [*]. We were going for the person.)

Jesus Christ

DebbieSteve
')

Uriah Heep

Steve
Triple Stumper
')
